property.name: staffName
property.formula: ( SELECT S.CO_STAFFNAME FROM CO_STAFFS S WHERE EL_STAFF_ID = S.CO_STAFF_ID )

property.name: deptCode
property.formula: ( SELECT S.CO_DEPARTMENT_CODE FROM CO_STAFFS S WHERE S.CO_STAFF_ID = EL_STAFF_ID)

property.name: deptDesc
property.formula: ( SELECT D.CO_DEPARTMENT_DESC FROM CO_STAFFS S, CO_DEPARTMENTS D WHERE S.CO_STAFF_ID = EL_STAFF_ID AND S.CO_DEPARTMENT_CODE = D.CO_DEPARTMENT_CODE )

property.name: createdUsername
property.formula: ( SELECT S.CO_STAFFNAME FROM CO_STAFFS S, CO_USERS U WHERE EL_CREATED_USER = U.CO_USERNAME AND U.CO_STAFF_ID = S.CO_STAFF_ID )

property.name: modifiedUsername
property.formula: ( SELECT S.CO_STAFFNAME FROM CO_STAFFS S, CO_USERS U WHERE EL_MODIFIED_USER = U.CO_USERNAME AND U.CO_STAFF_ID = S.CO_STAFF_ID )
